select s.id as lawid, s.lawname as lawname, s.version as version, s.enterid as enterid, st1.stuname as entername, (case when s.entertime is not null then date_format(s.entertime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') else "暂无" end) as entertime, s.checkerid as checkerid, st2.stuname as checkername, (case when s.checkedtime is not null then date_format(s.checkedtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') else "暂无" end) as checkedtime, (case when s.lawstatus='2' then '待审核' when s.lawstatus='3' then '审核通过' when s.lawstatus='-1' then '审核不通过' else "未知" end) as lawstatus, iw.grade as entergrade, cw.grade as checkergrade from securitylaw s left join student st1 on(s.enterid=st1.accountid) left join student st2 on(s.checkerid=st2.accountid) LEFT JOIN workloadrecord iw ON ( s.enterid = iw.accountid and s.id = iw.lawid) LEFT JOIN workloadrecord cw ON ( s.checkerid = cw.accountid and s.id = cw.lawid) where 1=1
and s.lawstatus = #{lawstatus}
and s.lawname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%')
and s.checkedtime >= concat(#{starttime}, ' 00:00:00')
and s.checkedtime <= concat(#{endtime}, ' 23:59:59')
and s.checkedtime between concat(#{starttime},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{endtime},' 23:59:59')
order by ${sortby} ${order}
